definition: beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]

sentences.english: Several years after the valley of families out of jail, wait at the gate of the valley of household is rich.
sentences.chinese: 數年後戶谷出獄，在門口等候戶谷的人是豐美。

sentences.english: They are much plumper than I am.
I can make use of this dull pigeon to grab a delicious feast from the kitchen.
sentences.chinese: 我可利用這隻愚蠢的鴿子，從廚房攫食豐美盛餐。

sentences.english: First, grab the chicken to catch fish, a hearty meal lush farm lunch.
sentences.chinese: 首先去抓雞捉魚，飽餐了一頓豐美的農家午餐。

sentences.english: This created a craving for rich food.
sentences.chinese: 這讓他進而貪求豐美的食物。

sentences.english: The cattle battened on the plentiful fodder.
sentences.chinese: 牲畜靠豐美的飼料養得膘肥體壯。

sentences.english: Yanqi is a beautiful place with dense water meadows where wild geese nest and breed.
sentences.chinese: 雁棲，一個水草豐美，大雁棲息繁衍的地方。

sentences.english: Since then, America had made up his mind to households valley for revenge.
sentences.chinese: 此後，豐美下定了決心對戶谷進行報復。

definition: to resemble nature itself/of the highest quality (idiom)
Shuangxi or Shuanghsi township in New Taipei City 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
green grass like cushion (idiom); green meadow so inviting to sleep on
to blend into one another/to blend together well
